# @babel/traverse

> The Babel Traverse module maintains the overall tree state, and is responsible for replacing, removing, and adding nodes

## Install

Using npm:

```sh
npm install --save-dev @babel/traverse
```

or using yarn:

```sh
yarn add @babel/traverse --dev
```
